about_the_game:
Here’s how I would describe my game:

It’s pretty average. It’s slow, long, repetitive. The graphics are decent, but nothing more. There are texture bugs, the zombie isn’t very impressive, there’s no customization options, and the sound design is quite bad, there is no end (just a white screen).

So, why did I release it anyway, you ask?

For those who enjoy pure, hardcore gaming and don’t care about anything else. There are 2,000 meters of labyrinthine tunnels, making it a serious challenge meant only for true gaming enthusiasts and difficulty seekers.

Now that you’ve been warned, here’s the description written by ChatGPT:

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Underground is an independent FPS horror game that immerses you in a vast network of dark, labyrinthine caves. You play as a spelunker lost in this terrifying expanse. Your objective is simple yet nerve-wracking: find the only exit before the situation becomes fatal.

Explore an endless cave
In Underground, you will explore a vast network of caves with no obvious visual landmarks. Every corner could be a dead-end, and danger is ever-present. The game's textures are designed to create an immersive atmosphere, with detailed and realistic environments that amplify the sense of isolation and claustrophobia. To survive, you must find your way through narrow passages, crawl through tight spaces, and search for the exit before all hope fades.

Survival in the dark
Your only tool: a flashlight that provides weak illumination. But beware: one wrong move could cost you your life. Underground is a ruthless game where every movement matters, and caution is your only ally. The total darkness and constant tension make every corner uncertain, forcing you to move slowly, always on edge.

A predator is hunting you
A strange and terrifying creature lurks in the shadows, an unpredictable predator waiting for the slightest misstep. You can never know where it is, but it follows you, listening for every noise, every shadow. Learn to detect signs of its presence—sounds, changes in light—and try to escape its pursuit, or face the fatal consequences of the encounter.

No second chances
Learning from failure is an integral part of Underground. Each attempt will help you better understand the cave, its structure, and refine your strategies. But if you make a mistake, there's no going back: no save points, no easy paths. The exit is in your hands, but it's fleeting.

Estimated playtime: between 30 minutes and several hours
With a labyrinthine map to explore and an unpredictable threat, each session can last anywhere from 30 minutes to several hours depending on your progress and ability to navigate the chaos of the caves. Every mistake brings you closer to the exit… or to death.

Key Features :


• Explore a labyrinthine cave network: Narrow passages and tight spaces. Exploration is a challenge in itself, where every turn can be fatal.


• Survive the darkness: Your only light, a flashlight, will guide you through this threatening world. The darkness is also your enemy, and every movement in the shadows could cost you dearly.


• An unpredictable predator hunts you: Stay vigilant—it could be anywhere, at any time. A deadly, elusive enemy moves randomly with you, ready to strike when you least expect it.


• Ruthless gameplay: Learn from your mistakes and refine your strategies to survive in this cave network. Caution and intelligence will be your only allies.


• No map, no landmarks: Rely only on your sense of direction and awareness to find the exit. Every turn could be a dead-end, and every sound could be a warning.


• Immersive and realistic atmosphere: Detailed textures and an oppressive sound atmosphere immerse the player in an increasingly threatening environment.


• Crawl your way through: Use narrow passages to sneak past the creature or find new routes to the exit. Every movement counts.

  • No customization or configuration : just pure gaming.

  • Moderate violence : the gameplay contains very little violence to remain open to a wide audience.

_____________________________________________________

This game is for those who love uncompromising challenges and are ready to venture into the unknown. Prepare to face your fears in Underground.

Good Luck !

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible DirectX
